Paper information/論文情報
Ocean-wave phenomenon around Japan due to the 2022 Tonga eruption observed by the wide and dense ocean-bottom pressure gauge networks
– Hisahiko Kubo, Tatsuya Kubota, Wataru Suzuki, Shin Aoi, Osamu Sandanbata, Naotaka Chikasada, and Hideki Ueda
Link: Earth Planets Space *Open Access/オープンアクセス.
